children.text:
The JavaParser class has a static parse method. For example, the standard usage is:

CompilationUnit cu = JavaParser.parse(new File("file.java"));

Or using an InputStream:

CompilationUnit cu = JavaParser.parse(in); Yes, that's right. So the missing code is indeed JavaParser.parse(in). So the user just needs to replace the TODO with that expression.
